fund_manager.name: Mr. Viral Chhadva
fund_manager.qualification: CFA Charter Holder from CFA Institute, USA, Master’s in Financial Management (MFM) from Jamnalal Bajaj Institute of Management Studies (JBIMS)

load.comment: • For exit on or before 15 days from the date of allotment – 0.25%   • For exit after 15 days from the date of allotment – Nil  The AMC reserves the right to modify / change the load structure on a  prospective basis.

value.scheme_objective: The  investment  objective  of  the  scheme  is  to  provide  returns  that  correspond to the total returns of the securities as represented by the  underlying index, subject to tracking error.   However,  there  is  no  guarantee  or  assurance  that  the  investment  objective of the scheme will be achieved.
value.suitable_for_investors: *: • Long term capital appreciation • Investment in securities covered by Nifty200 Quality 30 index *
value.type_of_scheme: An open-ended scheme replicating/ tracking SBI Nifty200 Quality 30  ETF.
